Summary: saw 7 ufo forming a triangular pattern shape with the exception of 1 of them
trends: There have been no other sightings in East China
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailswas almost to work...driving into work and saw 7 bright red\orange orbs floating in a triangular pattern with the exception of 1....tried taking pictures with my phone but couldn't get a good pic. they were hovering along the st. clair river almost onto canada's side. after driving into work which was less then a quarter mile from first sightingii brought one of my coworkers out to see them and by then they were gone. later at work i reviewed video of that time frame. i found one camera had caught the event. i got some good video and pics from that camera
